task.title: Adding a card
task.shortdesc: Cards are the most basic unit of a board. You can drag cards from list-to-list, add people to them, label them, attach files, create task checklists, etc.

context.p: Cards are the most basic unit of a board. You can drag cards from list-to-list, add people to them, label them, attach files, create task checklists, and more. Perform the following steps to add a card to a list:

step.cmd: Navigate to the list that you would like to add a card to.
For new lists, select + Add a card. For existing lists, select + Add another card.
In the input field, enter a title for the card, and click Add Card.

Click on the card to customize it. Double click the card title to change the name of the card. Use the description field to add content to the card. Customize the card with any of the features listed under ADD TO CARD.
